title: The Man Who Invented the Twentieth Century
description: s/t: Nikola Tesla, Forgotten Genius of ElectricityNikola Tesla was responsible for many electrical inventions, but is largely unheard of. Using Tesla's own writings, court transcripts and FBI files, this book pieces together the true extent of Tesla's scientific genius and tells the tale of how his name came to be so widely forgotten.
author: Robert Lomas
